name: Timescape (Okaime)
description:
Timescape is a game about time and it's flow. You control a being with a magic hourglass that gives him the power of time, allowing him to create a chrono clone, time control objects and beings and a shield. In this universe an mysterious power is corrupting all creatures and turning them into monsters, you have to discover how to solve it.

Control tutorials on game.

Game created by:

- Lead Artist

Thiago Okaime

Twitter and Instagram: @thiagokaime

- Programmer

Eduardo Machado

- Concept artists

Julia Soares

Instagram: @cloud__head

Benjamin Lira

Twitter: @ben10jamin_

- Screenwriter

George Prestrêlo

Twitter and Instagram: @georgeprestrelo)

- Music

Alexandre Machado
